items.title: 60+ Small Tasks to Defend the Right to Read: Book Censorship News, January 9, 2026
items.description: No one is coming to save us, so we must do it ourselves. Here are 60+ small tasks to help defend the right to read in 2026 and beyond.

items.title: The Best Books of the Century (So Far)
items.description: Throughout 2026, we'll share our best books of the century so far in various categories. Find the lists here as they're released.

items.title: The 20 Most Popular Libby Checkouts of 2025
items.description: The 20 most popular books on Libby show a clear pattern.

items.title: Southern Hidden Gems: Backlist Reads to Pick Up in 2026
items.description: Whether or not your goal is to read more backlist titles this year, these backlist gems works are worthy of your TBR.

items.title: New Books, Book Adaptations, and More News for Library Workers
items.description: Catch up on the latest news for library workers, including forthcoming releases, stories on AI, adaptation updates, and more.
